attributes.comment:
Please take pity on the citizens trying to build their family through international
adoption. The process, especially for China, is a difficult one and has already
faced increased waiting times and fees. I understand that everything in the world
costs money and that rarely do things become less expensive. However,
increasing these fees, which increased not so long ago, is more of a punishment
for those who are just trying to create a family. I'm sure that the revenue these
proposed increases would add could be collected somewhere else within the
USCIS.

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Lori A. Halop
